item.title: Cold health alert as parts of UK set to freeze on Christmas Day
item.description: Organisers of some Christmas Day and Boxing Day swims have cancelled events due to the weather.

item.title: The 25 best sports photos of 2025 - and the stories behind them
item.description: From the bottom of the swimming pool to the top of the pole vault bar, photographers reveal the stories behind these amazing shots. And a bonus point ...

item.title: Redknapp runner among King George contenders
item.description: Fact To File, Gaelic Warrior and Harry Redknapp's The Jukebox Man head the confirmations for the King George VI Chase at Kempton on Boxing Day.

item.title: Turkey arrests 115 IS suspects 'planning New Year's attacks'
item.description: Turkish authorities say firearms were seized and efforts to trace further suspected members are continuing.

item.title: 'England must stir themselves to find a Christmas miracle'
item.description: England must stir themselves and move on from investigations and social media videos if they want to avoid a potential 5-0 Ashes whitewash, writes chi...
